title: As AI Reshapes Tech, Microsoft, Others Refocus Dev Structure
author: Darryl K Taft
description: Microsoft consolidates AI and developer teams into a new CoreAI division, signaling a fundamental shift in how the tech giant approaches software development in the age of artificial intelligence.
cntitle: AI重塑科技，微软等公司重新调整开发架构
cndescription: 微软将AI和开发者团队整合到新的CoreAI部门，标志着这家科技巨头在人工智能时代软件开发方法的根本转变。
